thread.title: The top 5 NFL free agents at every position, ranked
thread.title_full: The top 5 NFL free agents at every position, ranked

title: The top 5 NFL free agents at every position, ranked
text:
Mar 6, 2017 at 8:39a ET 0Shares 
NFL free agency officially begins Thursday, but the “legal tampering” period gets underway two days earlier on Tuesday. It’s during that time that teams are able to agree to terms with free agents before they become official on the first day of the new league year. 
To get you ready for the madness that’s about to go down in the coming days, we ranked the best free agents at each position. This only includes unrestricted free agents and excludes players who are likely to be released – such as Tony Romo, Jay Cutler and Jairus Byrd. Getty Images Getty Images
